parameters.name: DeviceName
parameters.description:
The DeviceName of the device.

If you specify this parameter and set **FuzzyName** to **true**, the value you specified is used as the prefix to fuzzy match the DeviceName. The value must be at least 4 characters in length.

parameters.name: FuzzyName
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to fuzzy match devices by the value of the **DeviceName** parameter. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false** (default)

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the group. The ID is the globally unique identifier (GUID) for the group.

You can call the [QueryDeviceGroupList](~~93356~~) operation to query the **GroupId** parameter.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can view the **ID** of the instance on the **Overview** page in the IoT Platform console.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 200. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: ProductKey
parameters.description: The **ProductKey** of the product to which the devices belong.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The device status. Valid values:

*   **ONLINE**: The device is online.
*   **OFFLINE**: The device is offline.
*   **UNACTIVE**: The device is not activated.
*   **DISABLE**: The device is deactivated.
